text: The 2014–15 UMass Lowell River Hawks men's ice hockey team represented the University of Massachusetts Lowell during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey season. The team was coached by Norm Bazin, in his fourth season at UMass Lowell. The River Hawks played their home games at the Tsongas Center on campus in Lowell, Massachusetts, competing in Hockey East. ==Personnel== ===Roster=== As of November 9, 2014. |} ===Coaching staff=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%;" |- !
